d_protest_lag1: t-1 lag of at least one protest event
d_neighbors_proteset_lag1: One neighbor had 25 protest event in previous year (t-1 lag)
d_riot_lag1: t-1 lag of at least one riot event
d_neighbors_riot_lag1: One neighbor had 25 riot event in previous year (t-1 lag)
d_terrorism_lag1: t-1 lag of at least one fatality from terrorism
d_neighbors_terror_lag1: One neighbor had one fatality from terrorism in previous year (t-1 lag)
d_sb_lag1: t-1 lag of at least one fatality in civil conflict
d_sb_zeros_growth: Time since last state-based violence fatalities
d_neighbors_sb_lag1: One neighbor had one fatality from civil conflict in previous year (t-1 lag)
d_ns_lag1: t-1 lag of at least one fatality in non-state violence
d_ns_zeros_growth: Time since last non-state violence fatalities in years
d_neighbors_ns_lag1: One neighbor had one fatality from non-state violence in previous year (t-1 lag)
d_osv_lag1: t-1 lag of at least one fatality in one-sided violence
d_osv_zeros_growth: Time since last one-sided violence fatalities
d_neighbors_osv_lag1: One neighbor had one fatality from one-sided violence in previous year (t-1 lag)
pop_refugee: Number of refugees originating from country (log+1)
group_counts: Number of politically relevant ethnic groups
percip: Average precipitation in depth (mm per year)
arable_land: Share of land that is arable
tropical: Share of land with tropical climate
d_neighbors_non_dem: At least one neighbor is not democratic
oil_exports: Total petroleum and other liquids exports
water_rural: People using basic drinking water, rural
water_urb: People using basic drinking water, urban
internet_use: Share of individuals with Internet access
eys_female: Expected years of schooling for females
mys_male: Mean years of schooling for males
polvio: Political stability and absence of violence index
shutdown: Government Internet shut down in practice
tenure_months: Number of months that leader has been in power
dem_duration: Logged number of months that a country is democratic
elections: Election for leadership taking place in that year
lastelection: Time since the last election for leadership
